 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִבְחַז‎</span> **proper name, of a divinity** ==god of men of Avva==, [[2Kgs.17.31|2Kgs 17:31]] name otherwise unknown, compare [[BDB#Sch|Sch]]<sup>COT on the passage</sup>; [[BDB#B|ᵐ5]]<sup>B</sup> <span class="bdbLangGreek">τὴν Ἐβλαζερ</span>, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ἐβλαιεζερ</span>, [[BDB#A|A]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ἀβααζερ καὶ</span> <span class="bdbLangGreek">τὴν Ναιβας</span>; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] compare Mandean denominative <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נבאז‎</span> (Manuscript [[BDB#Nasar|Nasar. Norberg]].) Manuscripts give variant <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נבחן‎</span> compare [[BDB#Baer|Baer]]<sup>on the passage</sup> Frensdorff<sup>Mas. Magna i. 306</sup>.
